name: Microtech Asehm
overview:
Microtech Asehm is a young Congo-based start-up that offers various types of services in web development.

MAC(Microtech Asehm Corp) offers information system consulting services and architectural 3D modelling.

Thanks to a recent partnership with a French start-up called “Agence Mondo”, MAC offers services in web design as well.

In July, the start-up conducted a business partnership with KES (Koala Education Services) based in Harare, Zimbabwe. Thanks to the partnership, the company serves as a micro travel agency for African students wishing to carry on with their studies in universities member of NAVITAS (www.navitas.com) in the USA, UK, Australia, Canada, South Africa, Switzerland and Malaysia.

MAC takes care of enrollments and serves as an appointed agent of universities to embassies, therefore has a greater chance of getting student visas for it’s customers.
